group_1.textCenter: There were people who Kyoko's father saved...?

group_1.textLeft: ...That's right.

group_1.textRight: In other words,@the two people Kyoko just so happened to save...
...were her late father's followers.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
I was given their contact info to pass on to Kyoko,
since they wanted to thank her in person...

group_1.textRight: (So there were people saved by Kyoko's wish...)
(...to have her father's words be heard.)
(Then Kyoko herself rescued them as a Magical Girl,)
(which means they were saved again...)
I wish I could tell Kyoko...
...that her wish wasn't all for nothing...

group_1.textLeft: Yes...but Kyoko is still stuck@in that Witch's Labyrinth...
Also, this may not be the appropriate time@to bring this up, but...

group_1.textRight: Erm...what is it?

group_1.textLeft: I found someone who can adopt that kitten!

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: Those two people I mentioned,@Sachio and Shimako.
But...
The little girl and the kitten are still trapped@in the Labyrinth, aren't they...?

group_1.textRight: Yes...and Miss Ayano, too.

group_1.textLeft: But didn't Mami go in there?@What happened?!

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry...we all tried to fight that Witch,@but we were just no match for her...

group_1.textLeft: Is everyone alright?

group_1.textRight: Yes...we managed to escape unscathed.
A series of small coincidences has given us@a potential path to a happy ending...
But if we fail to save everyone,@we'll only get an unhappily ever after...

group_1.textLeft: C'mon, Kyubey! Isn't there something you can do?!

group_1.textRight: As I explained earlier,
Kyoko Sakura's doppel is currently@under the Witch's control.
The only way to overcome a Witch@who holds such great power...
...is to use a power even greater than hers.
The only solution is for Kyoko Sakura to gain control@over her Doppel.

group_1.textLeft: Right now...it seems Yachiyo and her cohort@will be arriving on the scene shortly.

group_1.textRight: So they're opting for force, then.

group_1.textLeft: Yes. Even if they can't beat the Witch,
I hope they can at least rescue those she's trapped.
And you know, if they can find Kyoko@and remove her from the Labyrinth,
maybe we can weaken the Witch's power that way!

group_1.textRight: If the Witch is drawing on the Doppel's power,
I highly doubt Kyoko is being left unguarded@like the other victims.

group_1.textLeft: Kyoko...@Is there any chance she can escape by herself?

group_1.textRight: It's very unlikely.
To do so, she would need to overcome herself.

group_1.textLeft: Overcome herself...? How so?

group_1.textRight: The doppel is likely Kyoko's past self@that her subconscious has rejected.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: The fact that the Doppel can wield Dazzle magic@is the strongest evidence towards this notion.
Her subconscious has been severed@from her past self,
thus she can no longer wield illusions.
The self who severed is the current Kyoko,@and the self who was severed is her Doppel.
She never actually lost the ability itself,
but only her so-called past self can call upon@her illusion magic.

group_1.textLeft: So we want Now-Kyoko to beat Then-Kyoko?

group_1.textRight: Yes.
But if the Doppel eclipses her entirely,
she will never be able to escape.
That would constitute "the end of the world"@for her.
On the other hand, if, by some miracle,@she takes control of her Doppel,
she may be able to rip apart@the Witch's Labyrinth,
from the inside out.

group_1.textLeft: Rip apart...from the inside out...?

group_1.textRight: If she gains control over her Doppel,@she can break the Labyrinth from the inside...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...as a Magical Girl,
by taking control of her Doppel,@she can control it at will...
If she does so from inside the Labyrinth,
she may be able to destroy this immensely@powerful Witch...

group_1.textRight: That would be incredible...

group_1.textLeft: Yes...but that would truly take a miracle.
It's not as simple as retaining awareness@during a Doppel's emergence.
While there are some Magical Girls who can ride out@an out-of-control Doppel,
there are few examples in the past...@of Magical Girls who have remained in control...

group_1.textRight: It would take a lot to pull that off...
There's no way we can break the Witch's influence@over the Doppel?

group_1.textLeft: ...I don't think so.

group_1.textCenter: We have to leave it all up to Kyoko.
It's not exactly a solution, though.

group_1.textLeft: ...So he said.

group_1.textRight: Thank you, Kagome.
(I...have no idea what we can do...)

group_1.textLeft: We heard you guys needed some help.
...Yes. Thank you.
(Kyoko...@Are you truly going to let it all end this way?)
(Surely that's not what you really want...)
